response.overview: When young Buddy falls into Santa's gift sack on Christmas Eve, he's transported back to the North Pole and raised as a toy-making elf by Santa's helpers. But as he grows into adulthood, he can't shake the nagging feeling that he doesn't belong. Buddy vows to visit Manhattan and find his real dad, a workaholic.

production_companies.name: Guy Walks into a Bar Productions

response.tagline: This holiday, discover your inner elf.
response.title: Elf
